perturbation.original_text: a.As of the VNBJ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.
perturbation.changed_text: a.As of the VNBJ Closing, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to include VNBJ, VNBZ and/or ANRA, unless the context requires otherwise.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase "except as expressly set forth in this Amendment" and changing the interpretation of "Company" or "Companies" to *include* VNBJ, we create an in-text contradiction. The amended clause states the JV Agreement ceases to have effect with respect to VNBJ, yet simultaneously includes it in the definition of 'Company,' implying the JV Agreement *does* still apply to VNBJ in some contexts. This introduces ambiguity and uncertainty.
perturbation.contradicted_text: a.As of the VNBJ Closing, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to include VNBJ, VNBZ and/or ANRA, unless the context requires otherwise.

perturbation.original_text: c.Except as expressly set forth in this Amendment and notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the JV Agreement (including Section 9.3.11 (Termination and Survival)), (a) effective as of the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement shall terminate in its entirety with respect to the Veoneer Parties and (b) after the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the Veoneer Parties shall cease to be a party to the JV Agreement and shall have no further obligations with respect thereto.
perturbation.changed_text: c.Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the JV Agreement (including Section 9.3.11 (Termination and Survival)), (a) effective as of the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement shall terminate with respect to some of the Veoneer Parties as determined by Nissin Parties and (b) after the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the Veoneer Parties shall cease to be a party to the JV Agreement and shall have no further obligations with respect thereto.
perturbation.explanation: By removing "Except as expressly set forth in this Amendment" and changing "terminate in its entirety with respect to the Veoneer Parties" to "terminate with respect to some of the Veoneer Parties as determined by Nissin Parties", the text now introduces ambiguity and contradiction. Article 1.3(a) now states that the termination with respect to some parties and determined by Nissin. Article 1.3(b) still states that termination and no obligations to all Veoneer Parties.
perturbation.contradicted_text: c.Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the JV Agreement (including Section 9.3.11 (Termination and Survival)), (a) effective as of the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement shall terminate with respect to some of the Veoneer Parties as determined by Nissin Parties and (b) after the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the Veoneer Parties shall cease to be a party to the JV Agreement and shall have no further obligations with respect thereto.

perturbation.original_text: Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall not release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable.
perturbation.changed_text: Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'shall not release' to 'shall release', it directly contradicts the intention of holding parties liable for breaches prior to closing. This is a direct conflict within the same sentence and clause, making enforcement of prior agreements extremely difficult. Because if a party did breach prior, it would be voided.
perturbation.contradicted_text: d.Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable.
